nodes.text: The Emperor suite was one of the two luxury suites on the Bazaar Deck of the luxury liner Kuari Princess, the other being the Kuari suite. It featured deluxe refreshment centers, split-level entertainment room, holo-overlay projector with a sensory adapter, a stock of vintage Pludris liquor, an original kinesculpture by Xephi Sep, private sentient butler, zero-g sauna, and a private computer. Each suite cost one thousand credits a day.
